title: Help, Champ in Ascension missing
body: On my first respawn into ascension, (playing as soraka) my champion model never loaded, could use my abilities but not my summoners like teleport to leave the starting platform, no one on my team could see me and i was stuck in the spawning area for the entire game unable to die or leave or see my character do anything in general. Help.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds like a connection issue, has it happened since?
